title: Karnataka Spiritual Tour 5
overview: Explore the beautiful spiritual attractions of Karnataka. This tour is designed to give you an immersive experience of Spiritual Spot 5.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Karnataka and transfer to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring Spiritual Spot 5 and nearby areas.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Breakfast and transfer to the airport/station.
